h2_title: The Druken Boar and the Kindgom of Sahali
content: The drunken boar (or the Yellow-Robed Squire as he's officially known) can be tricky to find, tucked away at the back of Rockrest Flat. But if you want to unlock the chapter's hidden area, you must complete his side quest. The questline has multiple steps, which start with you needing to bring him a Sobering Stone, either from the Windrest Hamlet or from the Man-in-Stone (once he becomes a merchant).

The drunken boar (or the Yellow-Robed Squire as he's officially known) can be tricky to find, tucked away at the back of Rockrest Flat. But if you want to unlock the chapter's hidden area, you must complete his side quest. The questline has multiple steps, which start with you needing to bring him a Sobering Stone, either from the Windrest Hamlet or from the Man-in-Stone (once he becomes a merchant).
